mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drones.PILOT_LOCATIONS (USER_ID, OFFICE, PHONE, ALTERNATIVE_PHONE, LOCATION_ID) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{office}, #{phone}, #{alternativePhone}, #{location.id} )
mapper.sql:
SELECT PL.ID AS PILOT_LOCATION_ID, PL.USER_ID AS PILOT_LOCATION_USER_ID, PL.OFFICE AS PILOT_LOCATION_OFFICE, PL.PHONE AS PILOT_LOCATION_PHONE, PL.ALTERNATIVE_PHONE AS PILOT_LOCATION_ALTERNATIVE_PHONE, PL.MODIFIED_AT AS PILOT_LOCATION_MODIFIED_AT, PL.CREATED_AT AS PILOT_LOCATION_CREATED_AT,
L.ID AS LOCATION_ID, X(L.COORDINATES) AS LOCATION_X_COORDINATE, Y(L.COORDINATES) AS LOCATION_Y_COORDINATE, L.CITY AS LOCATION_CITY, L.POSTCODE AS LOCATION_POSTCODE, L.MODIFIED_AT AS LOCATION_MODIFIED_AT, L.CREATED_AT AS LOCATION_CREATED_AT,
C.ID AS COUNTRY_ID, C.NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, C.MODIFIED_AT AS COUNTRY_MODIFIED_AT, C.CREATED_AT AS COUNTRY_CREATED_AT,
S.ID AS STATE_ID, S.NAME AS STATE_NAME, S.MODIFIED_AT AS STATE_MODIFIED_AT, S.CREATED_AT AS STATE_CREATED_AT FROM drones.PILOT_LOCATIONS PL LEFT JOIN drones.LOCATIONS L ON PL.LOCATION_ID = L.ID LEFT JOIN drones.COUNTRIES C ON L.COUNTRY_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN drones.STATES S ON L.STATE_ID = S.ID
mapper.update: UPDATE drones.PILOT_LOCATIONS SET USER_ID = #{userId}, OFFICE = #{office}, PHONE = #{phone}, ALTERNATIVE_PHONE = #{alternativePhone}, LOCATION_ID = #{location.id} WHERE ID = #{id}
